snippet: LEAD: They arrived at the Unocal junkyard 120 a day, creaking, wobbling, belching acrid blue smoke. A battered Chevy pickup with a door so corroded it threatened to fall off when slammed. A tired Ford LTD that left a trail of black haze....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: They arrived at the Unocal junkyard 120 a day, creaking, wobbling, belching acrid blue smoke. A battered Chevy pickup with a door so corroded it threatened to fall off when slammed. A tired Ford LTD that left a trail of black haze.

headline.main: Give Me Your Tired, Your Rusty . . .

byline.original: By MICHAEL LEV, Special to The New York Times
